name: Hell Fire (Games2PlayStudios)
description:
Hell fire is a 2d arena shooter game where you have to survive as long as you can and kill as many enemies you can. Fight to the death in this fast-paced and addictive arcade game. With only one motive, Survive.

Made in 48 Hours

This game is developed in only 48 hours thus proving that it isn't impossible to make a decent quality game in such small time.
